name: Breaking News: The Game
description:
Welcome to the Breaking News!
Breaking News is the new exciting role-playing game about the world of Big News Media.
You are a young CEO, who are starting a news startup WWN.
Your goal is to make your company Number One in the whole World!
Can you do it?

You will face a Hollywood stars, religious cults, corrupt politicians and many more.
Full immersion into the twisted storylines!
All this is waiting for you in the new game Breaking News!

FEATURES:
- Exciting twists and turns
- Multiple endings
- Lots of storylines
- Interactive financial system
- Make your company number one in the world
- User-friendly interface
